task.summary: Default task

2B app-
1. For the ILC return, when entering the customer code and customer doc as different values, after submitting on the front-end, the same customer code is reflected in the customer doc while update.

Unicol bharosa
1. version increased

Unicol bharosa
1. Theme color updated blue to red

2B app bugs fixed-
1. While creating new log and search customer and add box and try to lock, that issue fixed. 2. Scanned box delete issue fixed 3. Scanned box list selection issue fixed

Certify app-
1. Implementing Feedback API

Unicol vishwas app-
1. Feed api version increased

Certify App-
1. The feedback module has been implemented. 2. The permission grant issue has been fixed, and single-tap permission grant has been implemented. 3. Support for multiple feed images has been implemented. 4. Feed-to-library redirection has been implemented. 5. Unnecessary dependencies have been removed. 6. String texts have been added for all languages: *. FAQ *. No FAQ Added Yet *. Please try again later *. Share Your Experience *. Write your review or feedback here... *. Rate your experience *. Your insights are important. Rate Certify and help us refine your experience. *. Please provide feedback. *. Feedback must be at least 10 characters long. *. Feedback must not exceed 1000 characters. *. Please rate your experience. *. Your feedback helps us improve. *. Thank you for sharing your thoughts!

Hills cab
[v1.5.6] - [25 Feb 2025] [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I699/] 1. App Logo Update: Replace the existing app logo with the updated logo. 2. Permissions Handling: Modify the appâ€™s permission request flow to be controlled via a single button instead of multiple prompts. 3. App Opening Animation: Implement the provided app opening animation. 4. Tested Acvission Libarry for -> Product Details API Update: Ensure correct handling of status codes 103 and 105 for already scanned product codes.

Certify Factory
1. YML updated. 2. Cred.. updated

2B app-
[v1.2.3] - 19 March 2025- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I732 1. Removed the FMC icon from the Scan Option screen and optimized the page layout. 2. Removed the FMC icon from the Create Log Type Option screen and optimized the page layout. 3. Handled the Box Assign API status for both failure and success with appropriate messages ("Box assigned successfully!" and "Box assignment failed."). 4. After all boxes are scanned, the Camera Scanner page will close and redirect to the Box List page. 5. On the Document Details scan page, the box count layout is now hidden, as showing a count of 0 was unnecessary. Additionally, flashlight and camera lifecycle states (pause and resume) are managed. 6. The Warehouse button visibility is now hidden on the Scan Box Type page for the OLC log type. 7. Incorrect box count issue fixed on the backend (no changes in the Android code).

Leotaps APP-
[v1.0] - [20 March 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I790 ] 1. Cloned the SNCAB app and replaced the server credentials and logos. 2. Disabled the default splash screen. 2. Modified the splash screen to display a static image. 4. "Powered by" is now handled by the config/monolith API.
1. On the Sign-in page, the verify button disappearing when coming from the OTP page issue has been fixed.

Certify Factory app-
[v1.1.7] [24 March 2025] [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I788/ ]
Developer Notes: 1. Modified the Scanner screen to focus the camera box. 2. Added a reset button in the input part to clear the previously scanned data. 3. Fixed the issue where random special characters were sometimes added to the scanned barcode data. 4. Create a base structure that will separate different concerns such as UI, data, and view models. This allows for easy navigation, scaling, and testing.
Manifest modified
ReleaseNotes.txt updated

Leotaps app-
[v1.0.1] - [27 March 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I802 ] Dev notes- 1. The privacy policy is now non-highlightable. 2. The logo has been updated with a transparent color. 3. Unnecessary code has been removed. 4. Reward Library Update: [v1.92] - [March 27, 2025] [Zoho] - Link 1. After auto-approval of loyalty, the page now refreshes automatically to display points. 2. A shimmer loader has been implemented on the home screen.

Certify Factory app-
[v1.1.8] [31 March 2025] [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I788/ ] 1. Fixed the issue using the Zxing Library, where random special characters were sometimes added to the scanned barcode data. 2. Updated the corner shape of the scanner focus area.

Certify Factory app-
1. UI changed

Leo Wizard App-
[v1.3.3] - [02 Apr 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I816/ ] 1. Acvission library update for fix crashed of casting reward points

Uniqolable app
[v9.89] [02 Apr 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I816/ ] 1. Loyalty Library updated for- [v1.92] - [27 march 2025] [Zoho] - https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I808 1. After auto-approval of loyalty, the page needs to refresh automatically to show points. 2. Shimmer loader has been implemented on the home screen.
[v1.91] - [27 Feb 2025] [Zoho] - https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I739 1. Loyalty name: The XYZ name for the gone redeem button has been removed. 2. API error response: Handled and replaced toast with a dialog box. 3. Material dialog: Updated to use the native dialog box.
3. Acvission Library Updated for- [v3.6] [02 Apr 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I816/ ] 1. Reward points type casting issue fixed
[v3.5] - 20 March 2025 [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I786] 1. "Find Acviss code" text is now dynamically changed and replaced with the app name, based on the selected app language. 2. "Verifying with Acviss server" text is now dynamically changed and replaced with the app name, based on the selected app language.
[v3.4] - 19 March 2025 [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I786] 1. Result Screen in Product Name text removed. 2. Scanned Response code 110 handled 3. Removed information text form string files 4. One New Text field added for batch code to separate serial No text
[v3.3] - 27 Feb 2025 [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I740] 1. GPS location permission and access dialog and lifecycle implemented. 2. String modified -> GPS request denied to Location request denied 3. Material dialog: Updated to use the native dialog box.
[v3.2] - 26 Feb 2025 [Zoho-https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I725] 1. Location fetching. please wait toast removed.
[v3.1] - 14 Feb 2025 1. Config Acvission API implemented for Handle UI visibility from dashboard, [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I69] 1. Powered by 2. Mandatory Location while scanning 3. Fake report info on result screen 4. Download button on result screen 2. Implemented GSP location service, it will control from dashboard 3. String Text message added for all supported language. 1. GPS request denied 2. GPS is required for accurate location services. 3. Request again 3. For developer notes only(removed OTP less library from app, lib not found on git) 4. Single Tap permission implemented. 5. On OTP page keyboard automatically will gone after fill otp

Certify factory app-
[v1.1.9] [3 Apr 2025] [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I788/ ] 1. Added all type of barcode supportable in zxing library.

2b app-
[v1.2.5] [3 Arp 2025] [Zoho-https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I806] QA(Prabhu) notes- 1. After scanning the box in the ILC, I deleted the last box and scanned the wrong box from the batch I had already scanned. Then, I received a popup saying, "All the boxes of this batch have been added successfully." After that, the scanner got stuck. I tried scanning the correct box, but it wouldnâ€™t scan. 2. A duplicate Log ID is created in the OLC when the user refreshes or reloads the page by pulling it down. 3. On the home screen, the keypad for entering box IDs should automatically enter in uppercase. 4. In the ILC, the serial numbers are not in order, and duplicate serial number entries are occurring.( not fixed- backend issue )

Biocon app-
Publisher: Anand kumar Environment: --- Type: Release Version: 2.0.5 Date: 7 Apr 2025 Zoho: https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I837 Release Notes:
1. Certify Library updated for-
[v3.7] [03 Apr 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I816/ ] 1. Points value implemented as float for remaining data class
[v3.6] [02 Apr 2025] [ Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I816/ ] 1. Points value implemented as double
[v3.5] - 20 March 2025 [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I786] 1. "Find Acviss code" text is now dynamically changed and replaced with the app name, based on the selected app language. 2. "Verifying with Acviss server" text is now dynamically changed and replaced with the app name, based on the selected app language.
[v3.4] - 19 March 2025 [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I786] 1. Result Screen in Product Name text removed. 2. Scanned Response code 110 handled 3. Removed information text form string files 4. One New Text field added for batch code to separate serial No text
2. Loyalty library Updated for-
[v1.93] - [02 Apr 2025] [Zoho] - https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I819 1. Points value implemented as double
[v1.92] - [27 march 2025] [Zoho] - https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I808 1. After auto-approval of loyalty, the page needs to refresh automatically to show points. 2. Shimmer loader has been implemented on the home screen.
3. Removed deprecated library (otplessAndroidSdk) from the code, as it was unnecessary.

2B App-
[v1.2.6] [8 Arp 2025] [Zoho- https://sprints.zoho.com/workspace/acviss#P2/itemdetails/I838] 1. Fixed issue where the camera remained open after the popup was dismissed. 2. After one batch is successfully scanned, the laser continues for the next batch.
